name: Hugo Cruz de la Torres

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a a full-stack software developer with a focus on web development.
resume.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack developer with solid experience in the creation and improvement of web and mobile applications. Throughout my career, I have worked on a variety of projects, taking on key roles that have strengthened my technical skills and my ability to provide innovative solutions. My primary focus has been web development, and I have worked with various technologies to meet the goals of my clients and employers.

experiences.bullets: Development and maintenance of the TAM module of the Pax & Bags application using the following technologies: React 18 + Nestjs(CQRS) + Typescript + GraphQL + Postgres + TailwindCSS + Cypress + Docker + AWS.

I was working in the improvement and update of their website using the following technologies: Next.js 12/13 + Typescript + Tailwind CSS + Formik + React-Cookie + GraphQL(Apollo Client â€“ Graph Codegen) for layout and data requests to the backend and Cypress for the testing.

I was working in the improvement and update of the Aviato software  using the following technologies: Next.js 12 + Typescript + Chakra UI + Apollo GraphQL + Nodejs + TypeORM + Express + PostgreSQL + Jsonwebtoken + AWS.

experiences.position: Full Stack Developer at SITA AIRCRAFT
experiences.bullets: I was working on the Mission Control web/mobile application for flight control at airports and in airplanes using the following technologies: React 16/React-Native + Typescript + Graph API with Microsoft Teams  Node.js + Express + MongoDB + Material UI + HTML5 and CSS.

I was working in the development of a web site/app Digital Admission for the Chilean health system using the following technologies: React 16 + Material UI+ Node.js + Typescript + Express + Sequelize + Nestjs + .Net Core 6 + HTML5 and CSS.

I was working the PreconZ project in the development of a web/mobile application for the control of projects and users using the following technologies: React 18 + Typescript + Material UI + HTML5 + CSS + Firebase (Auth - Firestore - Storage - Realtime Database) + HubSpot.

I was working in the development and maintenance of the Transport-Administration web site for the use of geofences using the following technologies: Angular 11 + Typescript + Material UI + HTML5 + CSS + Firebase (Auth - Firestore - Storage - Realtime Database).

I was working in the development and maintenance of the web site/app Common Health Coordination Portal for the Chilean health system using the following technologies: React 15 + Typescript + Material UI + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + Jsonwebtoken + Sequelize.
I was working on the update and optimization of the Growing Brilliant website using the following technologies: React 15 + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS.

I was working in the development and maintenance of the (Swiss) Autovenn website using the following technologies: Angular 9 + Typescript + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + MongoDB + Jsonwebtoken + Mongoose.

I was working on the update and optimization of the Mealdeals app(swiss) using the following technologies: Ionic-Angular + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + MongoDB + Jsonwebtoken + Mongoose.

I was working on the update and optimization of the website(Swiss) Marketplace Boilerplate using the following technologies: Angular 8 + Typescript + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + MongoDB + Jsonwebtoken + Mongoose.

I worked in the applications department in the development and maintenance of SISCONT v4 v5 and v6 software using the following technologies: Angular 7/8 + Typescript + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Ignia + Genexus + SQL Server.

experiences.position: Frontend Developer and Teacher at University of Holguin
experiences.bullets: I worked for the IT department teaching Data Structuring 1 and 2 / Databases and Software Engineering classes as well as participating in the development of the Taxia Detection software using the following technologies: Asp.Net 3.5 MVC + JQuery + SQL Server + HTML5 + CSS.
